query: CREATE TABLE user_to_sign_up( username VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, password TEXT NOT NULL, first_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, last_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, /* Personal email address OR recovery email */ recovery_email_local VARCHAR(64), recovery_email_domain_id UUID, recovery_phone_country_code CHAR(2), recovery_phone_number VARCHAR(15), otp_hash TEXT NOT NULL, otp_expiry TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL );
